opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Taylor and in Re Harris

opinion:
537 U.S. 1079

IN RE TAYLOR; and
IN RE HARRIS ET AL.

No. 01-1605.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 9, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of National Mental Health Association et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 278 F. 3d 459 (first judgment); 31 Fed. Appx. 838 (second judgment).
